intents.description: Analyze NPS by region to understand regional satisfaction differences
Compare satisfaction across subscription plans to identify if enterprise customers are more satisfied than free/basic users
Analyze correlation between feature usage and satisfaction to identify which features drive the highest satisfaction
Segment customers by tenure and analyze NPS to understand satisfaction profiles of long-term vs new customers
Identify at-risk customers with low NPS and low purchase intent to assess retention risk

rationale: This analysis plan aims to provide a comprehensive understanding of customer satisfaction with our SaaS analytics platform. By analyzing various aspects such as NPS, satisfaction levels, feature usage, and demographic segments, we can identify key drivers of satisfaction and dissatisfaction. This will help us make informed decisions to improve product features, target underperforming segments, and enhance customer retention strategies. The insights gained will support strategic planning for product development and customer engagement, ultimately driving business growth.

suggested_segments.name: Promoters
suggested_segments.notes: Customers who are highly likely to recommend (NPS 9-10)

suggested_segments.name: Detractors
suggested_segments.notes: Customers who are unlikely to recommend (NPS 0-6)

suggested_segments.name: Free/Basic Customers
suggested_segments.notes: Customers on Free or Basic plans

suggested_segments.name: New Customers
suggested_segments.notes: Customers with tenure less than 6 months

suggested_segments.name: Low Purchase Intent Customers
suggested_segments.notes: Customers unlikely to purchase again (Purchase Intent 1-2)
